connectorData.description: A json object constructed from the url query params returned by the social platform. It must contain the `code`, `state` and `redirectUri` fields. The object must also contain the a `key` field with the value null.

200.description: A new identity is linked to the user.

422.description: The connector is already in use by another user OR the provided ConnectorID is invalid.

post.description:
Link authenticated user identity from a social platform to a Logto user.

The usage of this API is coupled with `POST /connectors/:connectorId/authorization-uri`. With the help of these pair of APIs, you can implement a user profile page with the link social account feature in your application.

Note: Currently due to technical limitations, this API does not support the following connectors that rely on Logto interaction session: `@logto/connector-apple`, `@logto/connector-saml`, `@logto/connector-oidc` and `@logto/connector-oauth`.

200.description: The identity is deleted from the user.

delete.description: Delete a social identity from the user.

422.description: The connector is already in use by another user.

put.description: Directly update a social identity of the user.
